TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ObjectStateManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 維護實體 (Entity) 類型執行個體 (Instance) 和關聯性 (Relationship) 執行個體的物件狀態與識別 (Identity) 管理。

span.span: Maintains object state and identity management for entity type instances and relationship instances.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會追蹤查詢結果，並且提供合併多個重疊查詢結果的邏輯。 tracks query results, and provides logic to merge multiple overlapping query results. 它也會在使用者插入、刪除或修改物件時執行記憶體中的變更追蹤，並且提供更新的變更集。It also performs in-memory change tracking when a user inserts, deletes, or modifies objects, and provides the change set for updates. 變更處理器會使用這個變更集來保存修改項目。This change set is used by the change processor to persist modifications. 這個類別 (Class) 通常是由 所使用，而且不會直接使用在應用程式中。This class is typically used by and not directly in applications. ## Examples 這些範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。These examples are based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 下列範例會從 中取得 並且使用此狀態管理員來存取內容中的物件。The following example gets the from the and uses the state manager to access an object in the context. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectStateManager](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#objectstatemanager)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ObjectStateManager](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#objectstatemanager)] 下列範例會針對傳回的 使用 方法，以便根據實體索引鍵取得物件。The following example uses the method on the returned to get an object based on its entity key. [!code-csharp[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ApplyItemUpdates](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/CS/Source.cs#applyitemupdates)] [!code-vb[DP ObjectServices Concepts#ApplyItemUpdates](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/DP ObjectServices Concepts/VB/Source.vb#applyitemupdates)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以變更物件的狀態不會在要刪除的條件約束關聯性中造成相關的物件。Calling the method to change the state of an object to does not cause related objects in a constrained relationship to be deleted. 變更物件狀態不會影響的物件圖形中的相關的物件。Changing the state of an object does not affect related objects in the object graph. 當您變更的實體物件項目以，物件的所有屬性都標示為已修改，不論目前或原始值。When you change the of an entity object entry to , all the properties of the object are marked as modified, regardless of the current or original values. 當實體物件的項目會變成， ，或，也會更新物件的關聯性項目。When the of an entity object entry is changed to , , or , the relationship entries for the object are also updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來傳回而不需要處理的物件引發方法。Use the method to return an object without having to handle the raised by the method. ## Examples 本主題中的範例根據[AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832)。The example in this topic is based on the [AdventureWorks Sales Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f16cd988-673f-4376-b034-129ca93c7832). 此範例會從 取得給定 的 。The example gets the for the given from the . 然後，它會取得目前的值`SalesOrderHeader.PurchaseOrderNumber`屬性，變更屬性的值，並且逐一列舉已修改屬性的集合。Then it gets the current value of the `SalesOrderHeader.PurchaseOrderNumber` property, changes the property's value, and enumerates through the collection of modified properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是中央程式設計介面，可讓您用來在執行階段和應用程式的內容中與 Entity Data Model (EDM) 中繼資料互動。The class is a central programming interface that you can use to interact with the Entity Data Model (EDM) metadata at runtime and in the context of an application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來取得持續的物件。The method is used to obtain the for objects that are persistence ignorant. 當物件實作或繼承自，則存取從屬性。When objects implement or inherit from , the is accessed from the property. 當物件處於無法傳回狀態。The cannot be returned when the object is in a state. 呼叫方法是呼叫相同方法，不同之處在於這個方法會傳回`false`而非引發例外狀況。Calling the method is the same as calling the method, except that this method returns `false` instead of raising an exception.
